com.io7m.r2.core

Class R2TransformST

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.io7m.r2.core.R2TransformST
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    R2TransformOrthogonalReadableType, R2TransformReadableType, R2TransformType, R2TransformViewReadableType

    public final class R2TransformST
extends Object
implements R2TransformOrthogonalReadableType, R2TransformType

    A transform represented by a scale, followed by a translation.

    The transform does not allow independent scaling on each axis and will therefore produce matrices that are guaranteed to be orthogonal.

      • transformMakeViewMatrix4x4F

        public <T extends R2SpaceType,U extends R2SpaceType> void transformMakeViewMatrix4x4F(R2TransformContextType context,
                                                                                      com.io7m.jtensors.parameterized.PMatrixWritable4x4FType<T,U> m)
        Description copied from interface: R2TransformViewReadableType
        Produce a view matrix for the transform. In this case, a view matrix is the view matrix required to place the observer at the transform's position, looking in the direction of the transform. In effect, this is the matrix resulting from the inverse of the transform.
        Specified by:
        transformMakeViewMatrix4x4F in interface R2TransformViewReadableType
        Type Parameters:
        T - The source coordinate system
        U - The target coordinate system
        Parameters:
        context - A transform context
        m - The output matrix
